verses.text: \w I|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* extol thee, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* king: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w bless|strong="H1288"\w* thy name \w for|strong="H3027"\w* ever; yea, \w for|strong="H3027"\w* ever \w and|strong="H3068"\w* ever.

Every day \w I|strong="H8478"\w* will bless thee: \w and|strong="H4043"\w* \w I|strong="H8478"\w* will praise thy name \w for|strong="H8478"\w* ever; yea, \w for|strong="H8478"\w* ever \w and|strong="H4043"\w* ever.

Great \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* greatly \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H1121"\w* praised: \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* greatness \w there|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* no end.
Generation \w and|strong="H3117"\w* generation \w shall|strong="H3117"\w* praise thy works: \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w they|strong="H3117"\w* \w shall|strong="H3117"\w* declare thy power.

\w They|strong="H3068"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* speak \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* magnificence \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* glory \w of|strong="H3068"\w* thy holiness: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* tell thy wondrous works.
\w And|strong="H7971"\w* they shall speak \w of|strong="H2671"\w* \w the|strong="H7971"\w* might \w of|strong="H2671"\w* thy terrible acts: \w and|strong="H7971"\w* shall declare thy greatness.

\w They|strong="H3027"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* publish \w the|strong="H7971"\w* memory \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H7971"\w* abundance \w of|strong="H1121"\w* thy sweetness: \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* rejoice \w in|strong="H1121"\w* thy justice.
\w The|strong="H0834"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3225"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* gracious \w and|strong="H6310"\w* merciful: patient \w and|strong="H6310"\w* plenteous \w in|strong="H1696"\w* mercy.

\w The|strong="H0430"\w* Lord \w is|strong="H0430"\w* sweet \w to|strong="H0430"\w* all: \w and|strong="H0430"\w* \w his|strong="H0430"\w* tender mercies \w are|strong="H0430"\w* \w over|strong="H5035"\w* all \w his|strong="H0430"\w* works.
\w Let|strong="H5414"\w* all thy works, O lord, praise thee: \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w let|strong="H5414"\w* thy saints bless thee.

\w They|strong="H0834"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* glory \w of|strong="H1121"\w* thy kingdom: \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w tell|strong="H1696"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* thy \w power|strong="H3027"\w*:

\w To|strong="H1121"\w* \w make|strong="H1431"\w* thy \w might|strong="H1323"\w* known \w to|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w men|strong="H1121"\w*: \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* glory \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* magnificence \w of|strong="H1121"\w* thy kingdom.

Thy kingdom \w is|strong="H4392"\w* \w a|strong="H2351"\w* kingdom \w of|strong="H4392"\w* all ages: \w and|strong="H6629"\w* thy dominion endureth \w throughout|strong="H0413"\w* all generations. \w The|strong="H0413"\w* Lord \w is|strong="H4392"\w* faithful \w in|strong="H0413"\w* all \w his|strong="H0413"\w* words: \w and|strong="H6629"\w* holy \w in|strong="H0413"\w* all \w his|strong="H0413"\w* works.
\w The|strong="H3318"\w* Lord lifteth up all \w that|strong="H0369"\w* fall: \w and|strong="H3318"\w* setteth up all \w that|strong="H0369"\w* \w are|strong="H0369"\w* cast down.

\w The|strong="H3068"\w* eyes \w of|strong="H0430"\w* all hope \w in|strong="H0430"\w* thee, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* thou givest \w them|strong="H3068"\w* meat \w in|strong="H0430"\w* due season.
Thou openest thy hand, and fillest with blessing every living creature.
The Lord is just in all his ways: and holy in all his works.
The Lord is nigh unto all them that call upon him: to all that call upon him in truth.
He will do the will of them that fear him: and he will hear their prayer, and save them.
The Lord keepeth all them that love him; but all the wicked he will destroy.
My mouth shall speak the praise of the Lord: and let all flesh bless thy holy name for ever; yea, for ever and ever.
